name: Cliffstone Manor
description: Enter a mysterious manor full of surprises and intrigue. Cliffstone Manor pits you against an eccentric millionaire inventor who wants to try and recruit you for his mysterious “Enterprise”. Do you have what it takes to solve the puzzles and meet his challenge?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7-3820 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980, AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, AMD Radeon  RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space
